questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
check and confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment
prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing report
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage 230

videos.src: assets/videos/SEMAAMEURA_RIRANSA/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALL OUTLET VOLTAGE.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALL OUTLET VOLTAGE

questions.question: shift the equipment to another place where the AC voltage of 230 is provided
check the power cord continuity as shown in the video and confirm whether the power cord is defective

videos.src: assets/videos/SEMAAMEURA_RIRANSA/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE POWER CORD CABLE.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE POWER CORD CABLE

questions.question: then replace the power cord with the new one
check and confirm whether the fuse is burnt
replace the fuse with a new one
check for any carbon formation or damage of the Input module
clean or replace the Input module accordingly
open the equipment as shown in the video, check and confirm whether the Input voltage is available at the power supply board

videos.videoName: Video for checking the Input voltage

questions.question: check the cable between Input module and power supply board for any damage / broken / loose connection
replace the cable / reseat the cable properly
check and confirm whether the output voltage of 15 VDC is available at the power supply board.
repair / replace the power supply board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the power supply

questions.question: check the connection between power supply and control board for any loose connection / breakage of the cable
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
repair / replace the control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the control board

questions.question: check and confirm whether there is unstable SPO2 or no SPO2 detected.
reconnect the probe properly to the patient and confirm whether the problem still persist.
check and confirm for any carbon formation, loose connection or breakage at the connecting pin of the probe
reconnect / replace the probe accordingly
replace / repair the control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the control board

questions.question: check and confirm whether the display is not getting ON / blank.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check whether the cable between display and control board is damaged / loose connection
reconnect / replace the cable accordingly
replace the display with a new one
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the technical team for any other assistance through video call.
Thanks
